scripts.start:darwin:linux: mkdir -p data/db; mongod --dbpath data/db > /dev/null & (sleep 1; node init_db_binary_tree_and_heap.js > /dev/null; node app.js > /dev/null & sleep 1)
scripts.start:win32: concurrently --kill-others "mongod --dbpath data\db > NUL" "node init_db_binary_tree_and_heap.js && node app.js"
